segments.text: Well , what a nice day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , the air is really fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it was not at all so fine yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it rained last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure did . It was a heavy storm , with lots of thunder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was fast asleep , and didn't hear a thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it may rain again later today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . I see some dark clouds moving in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There may also be a strong wind coming in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It'll be dusty , too , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe not . Dust is no longer a big problem in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've been planting trees for many years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . The fall in Beijing is really beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the summer isn't . It's scorching in the summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what about spring ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Spring is warm and short in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It must be cold in the winter , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You got it . Oh , by the way , it may be really cool in the evening around this time of the year . Don't forget to put on more clothes , or you might catch a cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for reminding me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome .
segments.speaker: S2
